models

Class Personnage

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.Personnage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Chef, Soldat

    public abstract class Personnage
extends Object
    Defines a base character's data and behaviors.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int force
      The character's hitting force (if any).
      private int id
      The character's identifier.
      private String nom
      The character' names.
      private int vie
      The character's current life (begins with 100).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Personnage(int id, String nom, int force)
      Initialize a base character's data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Removes a given life amount to the character's current life.
      boolean estMort()
      Whether the character is dead or not.

      Retrieves the character's force.
      int getId()
      Retrieves the character's identifier.
      String getNom()
      Retrieves the character' names.
      int getVie()
      Retrieves the character's current life.
      boolean isChef()
      Whether this character type is a chef.
      String seFaireSupprimer()
      A method that clean up the character whenever invoked for proper deletion.
      String toString()
      String representation of the character, shows their names.
      void tuer()
      Instructs the character to kill themselves.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Personnage

        protected Personnage(int id,
                     String nom,
                     int force)
        Initialize a base character's data.
        Parameters:
        id - Their identifier.
        nom - Their names.
        force - Their hitting force.

    • Method Detail

      • donnerDegats

        public int donnerDegats(int damages)
        Removes a given life amount to the character's current life. The value can be negative if the damages are higher than the character's current life.
        Parameters:
        damages - The life to remove (can be greater than the character's remaining life).
        Returns:
        The total damages made.

      • estMort

        public boolean estMort()
        Whether the character is dead or not.
        Returns:
        True if the character has no more life points (or is negative).

      • getForce

        public int getForce()
        Retrieves the character's force.
        Returns:
        The character's force.

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Retrieves the character's identifier.
        Returns:
        The character's identifier.

      • getNom

        public String getNom()
        Retrieves the character' names.
        Returns:
        The character' names.

      • getVie

        public int getVie()
        Retrieves the character's current life.
        Returns:
        The character's current life.

      • isChef

        public boolean isChef()
        Whether this character type is a chef. A base character is not a chef by default.
        Returns:
        True if the character is a chef;

      • seFaireSupprimer

        public String seFaireSupprimer()
        A method that clean up the character whenever invoked for proper deletion.
        Returns:
        A custom message, if any.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        String representation of the character, shows their names.
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        The character' names.

      • tuer

        public void tuer()
        Instructs the character to kill themselves.
